name.description: The name of the ECS cluster

setting.description: The settings for the ECS cluster

service_connect_defaults.description: The service connect defaults for the ECS cluster

tags.description: The tags for the ECS cluster

configuration.description: Configuration for the ECS cluster, including execute command and storage options
configuration.type: list(object({execute_command_configuration:list(object({kms_key_id:string, logging:string, log_configuration:list(object({cloud_watch_encryption_enabled:bool, cloud_watch_log_group_name:string, s3_bucket_encryption_enabled:bool, s3_bucket_name:string, s3_key_prefix:string}))})), managed_storage_configuration:optional(list(object({fargate_ephemeral_storage_kms_key_id:string, kms_key_id:string})))}))
